thread.title: Caliroots Teams up With Diemme on a Luxurious Tanned Leather Sneaker
thread.title_full: Caliroots Teams up With Diemme on a Luxurious Tanned Leather Sneaker

author: Aaron Howes
title: Caliroots Teams up With Diemme on a Luxurious Tanned Leather Sneaker
text:
Visit the original post to see all 9 images from this gallery. 
Caliroots ‘ premium section, C Store, has teamed up with Italian footwear specialist Diemme on a brand new sneaker. Together the brands have reworked Diemme ‘s mid-top Loria silhouette for an elevated look and premium comfort.
How? First off, the sneaker is constructed from Kudu antelope leather tanned by the British tannery, CF Steads. Secondly, the shoe sits atop an off-white Margom sole — an industry leader in footwear technology from Italy. The men’s sneaker features a regular Margom outsole while the women’s is fitted with a platform version. In addition, Diemme’s signature silicon-padded insole makes for an even more comfortable step.
The model is available in highly limited quantities — there are only 64 pairs — for €289.90. Cop a pair in-store and online from February 24.
Shop Here While you wait for the release, here are 15 things you can buy from Caliroots right now .
